index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND HUMAN SERVICES
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Housing and Human Services; increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1993 Budget of the Department of Housing and Human services for the conduct of the KidsDay Salute by reappropriation and transfer from the 1993 Budget of the Department of Finance General for such purposes.
committee: Housing, Health, Human Services and Education
